author: world today news
title: Mind Napasasi Promotes Bonanza Exotic Park with Lions – Featuring Songkran Techanarong
text:
Mind Napasasi posted a promotional clip for Bonanza, inviting you to come see the lions. Songkran Techanarong also commented. Is this clear? Opening for the new year
Behind hot female actors and influencers Mind Napasasi Came out to introduce his girlfriend and review his girlfriend after having dinner together on New Year’s Day. Even if you don’t open the page But people flocked to guess that it was a high society celebrity. Songkran Techanarong who are having
news together
Most recently (January 4, 2024) Mind came out and posted a clip to help promote Bonanza, Bonanza Exotic Park. In the clip, Mind is playing cutely with a beautiful striped lion cub with the caption “Come and play with me, brothers and sisters!“
While
celebrities and influencers Many celebrities also came to comment and teased their cuteness, including Nikki Nachat who said “very cute“But what made many people focus was Songkran Techanarong who also came to comment and talk with Nikki.”Moved to Khao Yai and became friends.” To which Nikki went to the comments and replied “Let me try it 3 days ago.“
At this time, it looks like this relationship is starting to become clearer and clearer. Soon we will definitely see it revealed to the media.
Thank you for the picture from:
Instagram mind_napasasi, songkarn_tae
